m_descr: Store sensor data in InfluxDB instances
error: Could not post influxdb statistics. Please check logfiles for details
interval_helper: Sets the interval (in minutes) for statistics updates. If left empty, then the statistics will only be updates if values change (not recommended).
server_helper: The final url used for writing will be $URL:$PORT/write. You have to include the protocol (ie. https:// )
tags_helper: All devices tagged with this label will be handled by this app
